demon.name: Demon
demon.description: Demon basic attacks have a 40% chance to burn 20 mana from their target and return mana to the attacker.

bonuses.effect: Dragons are immune to 83% Magic damage
If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to a 100% max health

glacial.name: Glacial
glacial.description: On hit, Glacials have a chance to stun for 2s.

hextech.name: Hextech
hextech.description: When combat begins, the ally team launches and detonates a pulse bomb, temporarily disabling nearby enemy items for 8 seconds.

noble.name: Noble
noble.description: Nobles grant +70 Armor and Magic Resist and heal for 35 on hit.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.description: The Ninja Trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 Ninjas.

bonuses.effect: Ninja gains +50 Attack Damage and Ability Power
All Ninjas gain +70 Attack Damage and Ability Power
Earn up to 4 additional gold after combat against another player (average 1.75g per chest)
Curse a random enemy at the start of combat, setting their HP to 100
Robots start combat at full mana

wild.name: Wild
wild.description: Attacks generate stacks of Fury (up to 5). Each stack of Fury grants 12% Attack Speed.

yordle.name: Yordle
yordle.description: Attacks against ally Yordles have a chance to miss.
